page.title: 17ECOLOGY-DALMACOULTER SITE 1
page.content: MONKLANDS DISTRICT COUNCIL HAS CLEARLY SHOWN IN ITS OPERATIONS AT { {DALMACOULTER LANDFILL SITE}THAT IT IS FULLY AWARE OF THE NEED AND ITS RESPONSIBILITY TO MAINTAIN AND IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF THE{ENVIRONMENT. DALMACOULTER QUARRY IN SQUARE 7667 LIES IN THE RURAL AREA TO THE NORTH OF THE TOWN OF AIRDRIE AND IT IS LOCATED SOUTH OF DALMACOULTER RESERVOIR AND TO THE EAST OF THE A73. IT IS A SHEER FACED QUARRY HOLE EXCAVATED INTO AN IGNEOUS SILL. GENERALLY SPEAKING, THE SITE IS SURROUNDED BY LOW QUALITY AGRICULTURAL LAND AND OTHER QUARRIES AND OPENCAST SITES. MONKLANDS DISTRICT COUNCIL BEGAN LANDFILL OPERATIONS IN NOVEMBER 1984. THE QUARRY IS ESTIMATED TO HAVE AN OPERATING LIFE OF 16 YEARS.
